attributes.action: make BBC channels pay per view like sky or cable
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: I think it is unfair and unlawful to ask people to buy a tv licence to watch their television, especially as their is so much choice now. Some people like myself hardly ever watch the BBC. People should not be forced to buy a licence. IT SHOULD BE FAIR - YOU WATCH YOU PAY, YOU DONT WATCH YOU DONT PAY!

reasons: Duplicate - this is similar to and/or overlaps with an existing petition or petitions
